thread.title: House Oversight Committee Requests Flynn Docs From WH, FBI, DoD, DNI
thread.title_full: House Oversight Committee Requests Flynn Docs From WH, FBI, DoD, DNI

author: Matt Shuham
title: House Oversight Committee Requests Flynn Docs From WH, FBI, DoD, DNI

organizations.name: house oversight committee requests flynn docs from wh
department of defense and office of the director of national intelligence

text:
The House Oversight Committee on Wednesday requested documents related to ousted National Security Adviser Michael Flynn from the White House, FBI, Department of Defense and Office of the Director of National Intelligence.
Read More â†’
